casebody.data:
Ronald J. TOWNSEND, Petitioner, v. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE, Respondent. No. 00-3014. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Jan. 11, 2001. Rehearing and Rehearing en banc Denied May 1, 2001.

Before MICHEL, SCHALL and GAJARSA, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
